DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the safety and efficacy of intracameral adrenaline for pupil dilation without topical mydriatics in refractive cataract surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Intracameral Adrenaline for Pupil Dilation Without Topical Mydriatics in Refractive Cataract Surgery
DOC.criteria: male and female can read and sign informed consent form； Clinical diagnosis of cataract Cataract density grade IIIII according to the EmeryLittle system classification system sensitivity to adrenalin； sensitivity to topical mydriatics； any other ocular surgeries； iris abnormalities
